mapper.insert: /* intrAprvProc10101010 : 품의문 기본 정보 등록 처리 */ INSERT INTO INTR_APRV ( APRV_IDX , CURR_APRV_SNO , EMP_IDX , APRV_TITLE , APRV_CONTENT , TEMPLATE_CD , REG_DT , REG_TM , EFCT_SDT , EFCT_EDT , USE_YN , DISP_ORDER , REMARK ) VALUES ( #{aprvIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , LPAD(#{aprvSno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},4,0) , #{empIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{aprvTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{aprvContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{templateCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , REPLACE(#{efctSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','') , REPLACE(#{efctEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','') , 'Y' , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(DISP_ORDER),0) + 1 FROM INTR_APRV ) , NULL )
mapper.update: /* intrAprvProc10101022 : CURR_APRV_SNO 현 단계로 처리 */ UPDATE INTR_APRV APRV SET APRV.CURR_APRV_SNO = (WITH MAIN_DATA AS ( SELECT SUB_DATA.* FROM ( SELECT LINE.APRV_IDX, LINE.APRV_SNO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DECODE(STEP_CD,'STEP_0002',1)) AS ROW_NUM FROM INTR_APRV_LINE LINE WHERE LINE.APRV_RSLT_DT IS NULL -- 처리 X AND STEP_CD = 'STEP_0002' -- 결재 AND APRV_IDX = #{aprvIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) SUB_DATA WHERE SUB_DATA.ROW_NUM = 1 ) SELECT MD.APRV_SNO NEXT_APRV_SNO FROM INTR_APRV APRV INNER JOIN INTR_APRV_LINE LINE ON APRV.APRV_IDX = LINE.APRV_IDX AND LINE.APRV_RSLT_DT IS NULL -- 처리 X AND LINE.STEP_CD = 'STEP_0002' -- 결재 INNER JOIN MAIN_DATA MD ON MD.APRV_IDX = APRV.APRV_IDX) WHERE APRV.APRV_IDX = #{aprvIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
